title: Activity Theory-Based Online Writing Proficiency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic writing proficiency and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical writing education for the general public, providing a flexible learning environment through mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can complete two or more collaborative writing projects to solve community issues.
Learners can revise drafts three or more times based on peer feedback and instructor evaluations.
Learners can apply topic-specific writing skills with over 80% accuracy using 10-minute microlearning content in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
